package.name: Smile_OpenERP_Synchro
package.summary: product catalog and sale order synchronization between OpenERP and Magento
package.description:
Want to add a multi-stocks, production, and localized accounting to your Magento store? Then that synchronization module is for you.
This module is contributed by the Smile French IT company: http://www.smile.fr/
Warning, OpenERP, and a deep understanding of how it works are required to use that module, see: http://www.openerp.com/
Features overview: 1) Product catalog upload from OpenERP, with product category and tax category synchronization. 2) Sale orders export from Magento to OpenERP, with customers and their adresses synchronisation; sale order status update.
Details here: http://code.google.com/p/magento-openerp-smile-synchro/
package.notes:
There are a few pitfalls and initial manual settings requirements in this version, see: http://code.google.com/p/magento-openerp-smile-synchro/
Please do not hestitate to provide feedback and contribute enhancements.
